title: 'God's Pocket' Is Horrifying, Humanist And Heartbreaking
teaser: Many people will find God's Pocket depressing, but once you get past the despair and carnage it's full of life. In one of his last film roles, Philip Seymour Hoffman stars as hapless Mickey Scarpato.
